017
018package org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.impl.codebuilders;
019
020import static javax.lang.model.element.Modifier.FINAL;
021import static javax.lang.model.element.Modifier.PRIVATE;
022import static javax.lang.model.element.Modifier.PUBLIC;
023import static javax.lang.model.element.Modifier.STATIC;
024import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.MAINTAINED;
025import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.ConfigAnnotationProcessor.MSG_INIGroupMissing;
026import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.ConfigAnnotationProcessor.MSG_INIKeyMissing;
027import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.ConfigAnnotationProcessor.MSG_INIPathMissing;
028import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.ConfigAnnotationProcessor.MSG_MissingStringConverter;
029import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.PropertySpec.PropertyFlag.ALLOWS_INIFILE;
030import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.impl.CodeBuilder.StandardField.STD_FIELD_INIFile;
031import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.impl.CodeBuilder.StandardField.STD_FIELD_INIFileName;
032import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.impl.CodeBuilder.StandardField.STD_FIELD_ReadLock;
033import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.impl.CodeBuilder.StandardField.STD_FIELD_WriteLock;
034import static org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.Primitives.VOID;
035import static org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.SuppressableWarnings.FIELD_CAN_BE_LOCAL;
036import static org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.SuppressableWarnings.THROW_CAUGHT_LOCALLY;
037import static org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.SuppressableWarnings.createSuppressWarningsAnnotation;
038import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.CommonConstants.EMPTY_STRING;
039import static org.tquadrat.foundation.util.StringUtils.format;
040
041import java.io.FileNotFoundException;
042import java.io.IOException;
043import java.nio.file.Files;
044import java.nio.file.Path;
045import java.util.Optional;
046
047import org.apiguardian.api.API;
048import org.tquadrat.foundation.annotation.ClassVersion;
049import org.tquadrat.foundation.ap.CodeGenerationError;
050import org.tquadrat.foundation.config.spi.prefs.PreferencesException;
051import org.tquadrat.foundation.inifile.INIFile;
052import org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.ParameterizedTypeName;
053import org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects;
054import org.tquadrat.foundation.util.stringconverter.PathStringConverter;
055
056/**
057 *  The
058 *  {@linkplain org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.impl.CodeBuilder code builder implementation}
059 *  that connects the configuration bean to
060 *  {@link INIFile},
061 *  as defined in
062 *  {@link org.tquadrat.foundation.config.INIBeanSpec}.
063 *
064 *  @extauthor Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
065 *  @version $Id: INIBeanBuilder.java 947 2021-12-23 21:44:25Z tquadrat $
066 *  @UMLGraph.link
067 *  @since 0.1.0
068 */
069@SuppressWarnings( "OverlyCoupledClass" )
070@ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: INIBeanBuilder.java 947 2021-12-23 21:44:25Z tquadrat $" )
071@API( status = MAINTAINED, since = "0.1.0" )
072public final class INIBeanBuilder extends CodeBuilderBase
073{
074        /*--------------*\
075    ====** Constructors **=====================================================
076        \*--------------*/
077    /**
078     *  Creates a new instance of {@code INIBeanBuilder}.
079     *
080     *  @param  context The code generator context.
081     */
082    public INIBeanBuilder( final CodeGeneratorContext context )
083    {
084        super( context );
085    }   //  INIBeanBuilder()
086
087        /*---------*\
088    ====** Methods **==========================================================
089        \*---------*/
090    /**
091     *  {@inheritDoc}
092     */
093    @Override
094    public final void build()
095    {
096        //---* Add the method that creates the INIFile instance *--------------
097        final var pathParameter = getComposer().parameterBuilder( Path.class, "path", FINAL )
098            .addJavadoc(
099                """
100                The path for the file that backs the {@code INIFile}.\
101                """
102            )
103            .build();
104        final var createINIFileBuilder = getComposer().methodBuilder( "createINIFile" )
105            .addModifiers( PRIVATE, FINAL, STATIC )
106            .addAnnotation( createSuppressWarningsAnnotation( getComposer(), THROW_CAUGHT_LOCALLY ) )
107            .addJavadoc(
108                """
109                Creates the
110                {@link INIFile}
111                instance that is connected with this configuration bean.
112                
113                @throws $T Something went wrong on creating/opening the INI file.\
114                """, ExceptionInInitializerError.class
115            )
116            .addParameter( pathParameter )
117            .returns( INIFile.class,
118                """
119                The {@code INIFile} instance.\
120                """ )
121            .addException( ExceptionInInitializerError.class )
122            .addStatement( "final $T retValue", INIFile.class )
123            .beginControlFlow(
124                """
125                    try
126                    """
127            );
128        if( getConfiguration().getINIFileMustExist() )
129        {
130            createINIFileBuilder.beginControlFlow(
131                    """
132                    if( !exists( requireNonNullArgument( $1N, "$1N" ) ) )
133                    """, pathParameter
134                )
135                .addStaticImport( Files.class, "exists" )
136                .addStaticImport( Objects.class, "requireNonNullArgument" )
137                .addStatement( "throw new $T( $N.toString() )", FileNotFoundException.class, pathParameter )
138                .endControlFlow()
139                .addStatement( "retValue = $T.open( $N )", INIFile.class, pathParameter );
140        }
141        else
142        {
143            final var fileComment = getConfiguration().getINIFileComment();
144            if( fileComment.isPresent() )
145            {
146                createINIFileBuilder.addStatement(
147                    """
148                    final var isNew = !exists( requireNonNullArgument( $1N, "$1N" ) )\
149                    """, pathParameter )
150                    .addStaticImport( Files.class, "exists" )
151                    .addStaticImport( Objects.class, "requireNonNullArgument" )
152                    .addStatement( "retValue = $T.open( $N )", INIFile.class, pathParameter )
153                    .beginControlFlow(
154                        """
155                        if( isNew )
156                        """ )
157                    .addStatement( "retValue.addComment( $S )", fileComment.get() )
158                    .endControlFlow();
159            }
160            else
161            {
162                createINIFileBuilder.addStatement(
163                    """
164                    retValue = $1T.open( requireNonNullArgument( $2N, "$2N" ) )\
165                    """, INIFile.class, pathParameter )
166                    .addStaticImport( Objects.class, "requireNonNullArgument" );
167            }
168        }
169        createINIFileBuilder.nextControlFlow(
170            """
171            
172            catch( final $T e )
173            """, IOException.class )
174            .addStatement( "throw new $T( e )", ExceptionInInitializerError.class )
175            .endControlFlow()
176            .addCode( "\n" )
177            .addComment( "Sets the structure of the INIFile" );
178        for( final var group : getConfiguration().getINIGroups().entrySet() )
179        {
180            createINIFileBuilder.beginControlFlow(
181                    """
182                    if( !retValue.hasGroup( $S ) )
183                    """, group.getKey()
184                )
185                .addStatement( "retValue.addComment( $S, $S )", group.getKey(), group.getValue() )
186                .endControlFlow();
187        }
188        PropertiesLoop:
189        //noinspection ForLoopWithMissingComponent
190        for( var i = getConfiguration().propertyIterator(); i.hasNext(); )
191        {
192            final var property = i.next();
193
194            if( !property.hasFlag( ALLOWS_INIFILE ) ) continue PropertiesLoop;
195            if( property.getINIComment().isEmpty() ) continue PropertiesLoop;
196            final var group = property.getINIGroup().orElseThrow( () -> new CodeGenerationError( format( MSG_INIGroupMissing, property.getPropertyName() ) ) );
197            final var key = property.getINIKey().orElseThrow( () -> new CodeGenerationError( format( MSG_INIKeyMissing, property.getPropertyName() ) ) );
198            final var comment = property.getINIComment().orElseThrow();
199            createINIFileBuilder.beginControlFlow(
200                    """
201                     if( !retValue.hasValue( $S, $S ) )
202                     """, group, key
203                )
204                .addStatement( "retValue.addComment( $S, $S, $S )", group, key, comment )
205                .endControlFlow();
206        }   //  PropertiesLoop:
207
208        final var createINIFile = createINIFileBuilder.addCode( getComposer().createReturnStatement() )
209            .build();
210        addMethod( createINIFile );
211
212        //---* Add the field for the name of the INI configuration file *------
213        final var iniFileName = getComposer().fieldBuilder( Path.class, STD_FIELD_INIFileName.toString(), PRIVATE, FINAL )
214            .addJavadoc(
215                """
216                The file that backs the INIFile used by this configuration bean.
217                """
218            )
219            .addAnnotation( createSuppressWarningsAnnotation( getComposer(), FIELD_CAN_BE_LOCAL ) )
220            .initializer( "$T.INSTANCE.fromString( $S )", PathStringConverter.class, getConfiguration().getINIFilePath()
221                .map( PathStringConverter.INSTANCE::toString )
222                .orElseThrow( () -> new CodeGenerationError( MSG_INIPathMissing ) ) )
223            .build();
224        addField( STD_FIELD_INIFileName, iniFileName );
225
226        //---* Add the field for the INI file *--------------------------------
227        final var iniFile = getComposer().fieldBuilder( INIFile.class, STD_FIELD_INIFile.toString(), PRIVATE, FINAL )
228            .addJavadoc(
229                """
230                The INIFile instance that is used by this configuration bean to
231                persist (some of) its properties.
232                """
233            )
234            .build();
235        addField( STD_FIELD_INIFile, iniFile );
236
237        //---* Initialise the INI file *---------------------------------------
238        final var constructorCode = getComposer().codeBlockBuilder()
239            .add(
240                """
241                    
242                //---* Initialise the INI file *----------------------------------------
243                """
244            )
245            .addStatement( "$1N = $3N( $2N )", iniFile, iniFileName, createINIFile )
246            .build();
247        addConstructorCode( constructorCode );
248
249        //---* Create the method that returns the INIFile *--------------------
250        final var returnType = ParameterizedTypeName.from( Optional.class, INIFile.class );
251        final var method = getComposer().methodBuilder( "obtainINIFile" )
252            .addModifiers( PUBLIC, FINAL )
253            .addAnnotation( Override.class )
254            .returns( returnType )
255            .addJavadoc( getComposer().createInheritDocComment() )
256            .addStatement( "return $T.of( $N )", Optional.class, iniFile )
257            .build();
258        addMethod( method );
259
260        //---* The builder for the code of the loadINIFile() method *----------
261        final var loadCodeBuilder = getComposer().codeBlockBuilder()
262            .beginControlFlow( """
263                try( final var ignore = $N.lock() )
264                """, getField( STD_FIELD_WriteLock ) )
265            .addStatement( "$N.refresh()", iniFile )
266            .add(
267                """
268                
269                /*
270                 * Load the data.
271                 */
272                """
273            );
274
275        //---* The builder for the code of the updateINIFile() method *--------
276        final var updateCodeBuilder = getComposer().codeBlockBuilder()
277            .beginControlFlow( """
278                try( final var ignore = $N.lock() )
279                """, getField( STD_FIELD_ReadLock ) )
280            .add(
281                """
282                /*
283                 * Write the data.
284                 */
285                """
286            );
287
288        //---* Process the properties *----------------------------------------
289        PropertiesLoop:
290        //noinspection ForLoopWithMissingComponent
291        for( final var i = getProperties(); i.hasNext(); )
292        {
293            final var propertySpec = i.next();
294            /*
295             * Skip the properties that do not have a tie to the INI file.
296             */
297            if( !propertySpec.hasFlag( ALLOWS_INIFILE ) ) continue PropertiesLoop;
298
299            final var name = propertySpec.getPropertyName();
300            final var group = propertySpec.getINIGroup().orElseThrow( () -> new CodeGenerationError( format( MSG_INIGroupMissing, name ) ) );
301            final var key = propertySpec.getINIKey().orElseThrow( () -> new CodeGenerationError( format( MSG_INIKeyMissing, name ) ) );
302            final var field = propertySpec.getFieldName();
303            final var stringConverterType = propertySpec.getStringConverterClass()
304                .orElseThrow( () -> new CodeGenerationError( format( MSG_MissingStringConverter, name ) ) );
305            final var stringConverterCode = determineStringConverterInstantiation( stringConverterType )
306                ? getComposer().statementOf( "final var stringConverter = $T.INSTANCE", stringConverterType )
307                : getComposer().statementOf( "final var stringConverter = new $T()", stringConverterType );
308
309            //---* Load the value *--------------------------------------------
310            loadCodeBuilder.beginControlFlow( EMPTY_STRING )
311                .add( stringConverterCode )
312                .addStatement( "$1N = $2N.getValue( $3S, $4S, stringConverter ).orElse( $1N )", field, iniFile, group, key )
313                .endControlFlow();
314
315            //---* Write the value *-------------------------------------------
316            updateCodeBuilder.beginControlFlow( EMPTY_STRING )
317                .add( stringConverterCode )
318                .addStatement( "$2N.setValue( $3S, $4S, $1N, stringConverter )", field, iniFile, group, key )
319                .endControlFlow();
320        }   //  PropertiesLoop:
321
322        //---* Create the loadINIFile() method *-------------------------------
323        loadCodeBuilder.nextControlFlow(
324            """
325
326            catch( final $T e )
327            """, IOException.class )
328            .addStatement( "throw new $T( e )", PreferencesException.class )
329            .endControlFlow();
330        final var loadMethod = getComposer().methodBuilder( "loadINIFile" )
331            .addModifiers( PUBLIC, FINAL )
332            .addAnnotation( Override.class )
333            .returns( VOID )
334            .addJavadoc( getComposer().createInheritDocComment() )
335            .addCode( loadCodeBuilder.build() )
336            .build();
337        addMethod( loadMethod );
338
339        //---* Create the updateINIFile() method *-----------------------------
340        updateCodeBuilder.add( "\n" )
341            .addStatement( "$N.save()", iniFile )
342            .nextControlFlow(
343                """
344
345                catch( final $T e )
346                """, IOException.class )
347            .addStatement( "throw new $T( e )", PreferencesException.class )
348            .endControlFlow();
349        final var updateMethod = getComposer().methodBuilder( "updateINIFile" )
350            .addModifiers( PUBLIC, FINAL )
351            .addAnnotation( Override.class )
352            .returns( VOID )
353            .addJavadoc( getComposer().createInheritDocComment() )
354            .addCode( updateCodeBuilder.build() )
355            .build();
356        addMethod( updateMethod );
357    }   //  build()
358}
359//  class INIBeanBuilder
360
361/*
362 *  End of File
363 */
